meanings.definition: The period of time during the day when a person works at a job.
meanings.sent1: During the dayshifts, employees are usually busy with their tasks.
meanings.sent2: She prefers dayshifts because she can spend evenings with her family.
meanings.sent3: The dayshifts seem to fly by when you're having fun at work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dayshifts, time is the boss that never takes a break.
meanings.sent5: The bright sun during dayshifts makes the office feel warm and inviting.

meanings.definition: The act of working during the daytime.
meanings.sent1: Dayshifts are great for those who enjoy the sunlight while working.
meanings.sent2: His energy peaks during dayshifts, making him more productive.
meanings.sent3: The dayshifts bring a sense of routine and structure to the workday.
meanings.sent4: During dayshifts, the hustle and bustle of the city can be heard outside.
meanings.sent5: The dayshifts offer a chance to be active and engaged during the day.
